channel.title: How can i edit drops of npc? where can i edit it?
channel.description: like i added some npc ( 3 chicken ) and i want that they drop crystal key ... im using erasedpkz base, btkscape v2 source. plz someone can help me :( ?

item.title: How can i edit drops of npc? where can i edit it?
item.dc:creator: @cedrick cedrick
item.description:
@cedrick wrote:

i want that they drop 1 crystal key sometime… and :S
so i did it good. or its 30crystal key soemtime :?

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @jaruanna jaruanna

Cedrick, from what I understand that means you want the chicken to drop 30 crystal keys 50% of the time. I looked up on the subject and that should be fine.

item.title: How can i edit drops of npc? where can i edit it?
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“cedrick, post:12, topic:431062”]chicken id ?

the white
the brown
the white/brown

lol its not good?[/quote]

Watch, this is how you add:

#NPC NAME here
####:## ####:## ####:## ####:## ####:## ####:##

#### = Item ID you want to be dropped

= The rate of which the item is dropped

Bolded is what YOU need to read

Read full topic

#chicken

#chicken
2314:30 989:100 995:7500000
#chicken
2315:30 989:100 995:7500000

1= super rares 10= rares 100= everytime… i dont really understand what u want mean by %%%%:%% %%%%:%%
really anoyying.

just tell me what to write plz.[/quote]

I can’t just give you it. Heres a sample:

#Guard drops
9:1 995:200 555:100

item.source: How can i edit drops of npc? where can i edit it?

item.title: How can i edit drops of npc? where can i edit it?
item.dc:creator: @JCor9 JCor9
item.description:
@JCor9 wrote:

Do somthing like this…

#chicken Chicken ID:Drop Rate Item ID:Amount Dropped.
if you want them to drop more then one item you would do this

#Chicken Chicken ID:Drop Rate Item ID:Amount Droped Item ID: Amount Dropeed

Example from my Server

#Frost_dragon 10775:30 555:100 560:100

Read full topic
